CONCLUSION: Preliminary objection dismissed (victim);Violation of Art. 6-1;Violation of Art. 13;Damage - financial award;Costs and expenses award
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in PERSON , the GPE region .
CARDINAL . The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

CARDINAL . On DATE and DATE ORG ( Краснолуцький міський суд Луганської області ) awarded the applicant ORG CARDINAL,CARDINAL.CARDINAL and ORG CARDINAL.CARDINAL respectively in salary arrears and other payments against his former employer , ORG “ GPE ” ( ДВАТ “ GPE автобаза ” ДХК LOC ” ) . These judgments became final and the enforcement writs were transferred to ORG ( ORG виконавчої служби ORG міського управління юстиції ) for enforcement .
CARDINAL . The applicant received the debt due to him by the judgment of DATE on DATE and on DATE - by the judgment of DATE .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG explained to the applicant that the delays in the enforcement of the judgments in his favour had been caused by the debtor 's reorganization , the holding of its assets in a tax lien and the statutory moratorium on the forced sale of ORG property .
CARDINAL . The relevant domestic law is summarised in the judgment of ORG v. GPE ( no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL , § § DATE , DATE ) .
